ygData.subject: SV: Rubicite replacement armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Is that the metal you need to smith the armor with the molds? Is the metal nodrop? Please get back to us ASAP! when you have found out if this is indeed what
ygData.messageBody:
Is that the metal you need to smith the armor with the molds?
Is the metal nodrop?
Please get back to us ASAP! when you have found out if this is indeed what you think it is...!!! :)

- Avron -

----- Original Message -----
From: Dark <dark@...>
To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, October 17, 1999 2:56 AM
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Rubicite replacement armor


> From: "Dark" <dark@...>
>
> Well unfortunatly today while hunting in Sol A on my other char I came
> across some melatite. One of the paladin's managed to crash while this
> happened and I'm not sure but I think that is the last piece he needs.
>
> Kananek
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Nicholas20@... <Nicholas20@...>
> To: eqpaladin@onelist.com <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
> Date: Saturday, October 16, 1999 4:29 AM
> Subject: RE: [eqpaladin] Rubicite replacement armor
>
>
> >From: Nicholas20@...
> >

> paladin armor, and if the cleric armor costs 2k, big deal money comes pretty

> >
